ACCESS_MANAGED.label: Access control
ACCESS_MANAGED.description: Control who can access and manage your assets

BOND.label: Fixed returns
BOND.description: Create bonds with maturity dates and fixed returns

BURNABLE.label: Destroy tokens
BURNABLE.description: Allow asset holders to permanently destroy assets

CAPPED.label: Supply limit
CAPPED.description: Set a maximum limit on asset supply

COLLATERAL.label: Loan security
COLLATERAL.description: Use assets as collateral for loans and financing

FUND.label: Fund management
FUND.description: Manage investment funds with built-in fee structures

HISTORICAL_BALANCES.label: Full history
HISTORICAL_BALANCES.description: Track complete transaction history and balances

PAUSABLE.label: Emergency stop
PAUSABLE.description: Temporarily pause asset transfers for emergencies

REDEEMABLE.label: Cash out
REDEEMABLE.description: Allow assets to be exchanged for underlying value

YIELD.label: Earn returns
YIELD.description: Generate automatic returns and interest payments
